title: Happy Waters
author: Happy Waters
content: Please note:: The first person, or foolish dummy, to say "Scam! Who The F@ck are you!" has no concept of the true meaning of 100% Decentralized Funding, thank you. Question) Is 100% Decentralized Funding For A Huge Multi-Seed, Multi-Season "TV Smash Hit Show!" actually a new concept? WOW!Standing there - as a simple statement - is it actually true? Has someone "suggested or tried" this before, or is the team we start in this thread the first ever?Fact: ~5 0r 7 years ago there was a PBS/NBR Real-World episode about how the 5, 6 , or 7 biggest digital content providers are competing to spend "Mega-Billions USD" investing in new content creators. OK, so the time to get started is now!Interested on not? Please, try to inform me as to why this is not a Great Idea for Starting Today!

Maybe if you want suggestions or advise, you should make what you say make sense to readers.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: How do you fund a "TV Smash Hit Show!"... before you know if it is going to be a hit? How do you fund a show, if you do not provide the information on what the show will be about and who will be the producers of the show? (Anyone can take their cellphone or a camera and video tape something and do some basic video editing and call it ....content) Â Do you actually have a groundbreaking idea for a show... or are you asking people to crowd fund an idea... that are not formalized yet? Yes, adding the word "decentralized" to a concept.. sounds nice, but it has to have some kind of business plan.
